title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 12
description:
Day 5 of the trip, Cooke City Montana and Yellowstone National Park. The narrator​ remembers Phaedrus' friend DeWeese, 2 Years of studying Eastern philosophy in India,, but the effects are delayed, the low-Quality of the tourist park.

Pirsig Interview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RULOIr4MJII
Video of the journey by Lee Glover: https://youtu.be/OEf_gT7kuF4
